circumstances:
The single engine airplane was completing a local sortie, carrying one passenger, one pilot and one mechanic. While making a sharp turn at low height, the pilot lost control of the airplane that crashed near the beach. All three occupants were injured, two seriously. Few hours later, the pilot and the passenger died from their injuries. 
Crew:
Gordon L. Groah, pilot, †
Gaston Cornett, mechanic. 
Passenger:
Mrs. Richard H. Long. †
